Text:
I agree with jj94022 the UK version was pretty bland and didn't really have that "deep" connection with the audience. While watching the UK version they would do everything quick and didn't really give it it's true shine...Like the US does. 

Oh and even more great news, SHOWTIME just picked up Shameless for yet ANOTHER SEASON! Woo! So much for "RIP" eh? ahahahahahahaha
